headline: What O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY)'s $2 Billion Buyback Boost Means For Shareholders
summary: On November 18, 2025, O’Reilly Automotive announced it would increase its equity buyback plan by an additional US$2.00 billion, expanding its total buyback authorization to US$29.75 billion and extending the program for three more years. This significant increase in the buyback program coincided with robust growth results, a rise in earnings per share, and raised full-year guidance, highlighting the company’s confidence in its ongoing expansion and demand outlook. We'll examine how the...
